text: This week's edition of our curated career roundup from the Archinect Job board features 20 architecture and design firms in New York City with exciting intermediate architecture and interior design job opportunities. To look up specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series. Also, follow our Archinect Tips series to improve your portfolio, resume, interviewing skills, and increase your overall chances of getting that next job. S9 Architecture seeks an Intermediate Design Architect/PlannerQualifications include a minimum of six-plus years of experience, proficiency with Rhino, AutoCAD, InDesign, Illustrator, and Photoshop, a strong design sensibility with a keen eye for detail, strong organizational skills, and excellent graphic, written, and verbal communication skills, with experience in delivering presentations. The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect and an Interior Designer.The Blanton Museum of Art at The University of Texas at Austin by Snøhetta.Snøhetta seeks a Project Designer - Interior Architecture"The PA works on project teams to advance the successful completion of projects, tasks, and initiatives. This is an intermediate position at Snøhetta in which a person has an increased level of responsibility for project design, delivery, and management. They lead and mentor Designers or Interns who are a part of their project team(s). Over time, the PA will lead more independently and develop advanced design and project coordination skills." Fogarty Finger seeks an Intermediate Interior Architectural Designer - Commercial Interiors"Working with the project team, the right candidate would be responsible for taking a leadership role on multiple projects of various scales. This would include management and production, as required, throughout all phases of any particular project. We are looking for a candidate that has strong design and technical skills and a broad range of local experience. Salary and benefits are competitive and based on experience/skill level." The firm is also hiring for a number of roles. The Dime by Fogarty Finger.Bories & Shearron Architecture seeks an Intermediate Architect"New York architecture firm, specializing in Traditional / Classical residential design, and member of Architectural Digest's AD 100, has immediate openings for intermediate level architects or architectural associates with a minimum of 5-8 years of experience. Candidate must possess proficiency in AutoCAD, strong organizational skills, highly motivated to learn, and enjoy working in a team environment. Ability to draw by hand is a plus. A great opportunity for an intermediate level architect interested in luxury residential architecture, working directly with principals and project managers on a wide variety of projects in a highly creative environment." Bowerbird Architects seeks a Junior/Intermediate Architect"You will participate in all phases of the project from schematic design, through construction documents and construction administration. [...] You will be expected to work on many forms of residential architecture, offices, and retail, from renovations to additions, and new, ground-up buildings. You will meet directly with clients, and eventually be in charge of running projects from start to finish yourself, so you should have excellent abilities to articulate ideas and organize complex projects." 1100 Architect seeks an Intermediate Architect"1100 Architect is currently seeking full-time architects with design experience on all phases of architectural projects. Candidates must have advanced construction details experience." Qualifications include a minimum of eight years of experience, Revit experience, the ability to develop creative design concepts and translate them into effective collaborative documents, and strong verbal and written communication skills. The firm is also hiring for an Architectural Designer. House on Ikema Island by 1100 Architect. Photo: Shinichi SatoMargaret Sullivan Studio seeks an Intermediate Designer"Margaret Sullivan Studio (MSS) is seeking a diligent, passionate individual with education and experience in architecture or interior design to join our dynamic studio. The ideal candidate has an entrepreneurial spirit and is a critical thinker with a user-centered approach to design and who focuses their design approach through the lenses of community, placemaking, service design, social impact, and social justice." The firm is also hiring for a Strategic Designer and Assistant Project Manager. Joseph Vance Architects seeks an Intermediate Architect/Designer - Residential"Our studio is currently seeking an Intermediate Architect/Designer with 5-8 years experience, strong 3D modeling skills and design sense to join our team and jump into new single family residential projects in the city. Ideally you have expertise in BIM software (Revit or Archicad), experience with residential architecture, as well as great design sensibility and critical thinking skills." Brooklyn Townhouse by Joseph Vance Architects. Photo: Mikiko KikuyamaArchimaera Architecture seeks an Intermediate Architect"The candidate we’re looking for has strong design and technical skills and a range of local experience. They will work alongside Project Managers and Principals to execute architectural designs through all of the project phases. The position will be responsible for taking a leadership role on multiple projects at various scales, and will include mentoring and managing junior staff throughout all project phases." The firm is also hiring for a Junior Architect. A+I seeks an Intermediate Interior Designer, FFE Focus"As a key member of A+I project teams, you will work closely with fellow team members, not only other interior designers, but also architects, strategists, and brand/graphic designers. Through your strong design and communication skills, you will take a large part in delivering meaningful, beautiful, integrated projects through well-managed processes and communication." The firm is also hiring for an Accomplished Project Manager/Project Architect and an Intermediate Architectural Designer. Shadow Architects seeks an Intermediate Designer"The studio is currently seeking applicants for a full time Intermediate Interior Designer/Architect. Candidates should have a strong background in design, and be capable of working resourcefully and accurately under deadlines. Our Flatiron based studio has a tight-knit team of designers in a casual but focused work environment, and offers a competitive salary/benefits package." The Musket Room by Shadow Architects.NAVA Partners seeks a Project Designer/Intermediate Architectural Designer III"NAVA is seeking a talented Architectural Designer with 6–8 years of experience to join our multidisciplinary studio. This role requires strong design ability, technical expertise in Revit, and experience delivering residential and mixed-use projects. The ideal candidate is proactive, collaborative, and passionate about creating sustainable and equitable architecture." FROM Architecture seeks an Intermediate Project Architect"The candidate needs to have working experience in high-end residential and retail projects (jewelry stores experience will be highly considered). It's preferred a diversified experience that includes design skills and technical knowledge. Great communication and proactive and positive attitude are a must. Proficiency in AutoCAD, Adobe Suite (Photoshop, In-Design, Illustrator), and Rhino is required." CRÈME / Jun Aizaki Architecture & Design seeks an Intermediate Interior Designer with Hotel Experience"We are seeking an Interior Designer/Architect with at least 5 years of experience in hospitality, retail and multi-unit residential design to join our international team." Qualifications include proficiency with AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, and Microsoft Office. The firm is also hiring for a Senior Interior Designer Role with Hotel Experience and Freelance Interior Designers. Community Smith by CRÈME / Jun Aizaki Architecture & Design.PBDW Architects seeks an Intermediate ArchitectQualifications include five to eight years of experience, proficiency with Revit and AutoCAD, strong organizational and time management skills, and spoken and written English proficiency. The firm is also hiring for a Junior Architect with REVIT experience. StudioSC seeks an Intermediate Architect / DesignerQualifications include three to seven years of experience, fluency in Revit, an understanding of how a multifamily residential project works within New York City, a basic understanding of NYC codes and zoning, creative design skills and the ability to translate design into drawings, and strong communication skills. The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect. Desai Chia Architecture seeks an Intermediate ArchitectQualifications include five to eight years of experience, proficiency with Revit, Adobe Creative Suite, and 3D modeling and rendering, excellent written and verbal communications skills, strong organizational skills, and the ability to work independently, as well as in a team. LM Guest House by Desai Chia Architecture. Photo: Paul WarcholGrimshaw seeks an Intermediate Architect"We are currently seeking Architects to join our New York studio. Our ideal candidate is a great designer, highly motivated, well organized, thoughtful, and has experience working as part of a design team on large projects. The candidate will have good communication skills, enjoys working collaboratively with others, and is reliable, trustworthy and detail-oriented." The firm is also hiring for a number of roles. Duke University West Campus Union Renovation by Grimshaw.Rockwell Group seeks an Architectural DesignerQualifications include five-plus years of experience in architecture, interiors, or design, strong experience in Rhino, Adobe Creative Cloud, Revit, and AutoCAD, the ability to render in V-Ray or Enscape, experience with all project phases, and strong organizational and time management skills. The firm is also hiring for a Senior Interior Designer, an Interior Designer, and a Senior Architectural Designer / Project Manager. Carlos Zapata Studio seeks an Intermediate Architect"Carlos Zapata Studio, an award-winning design firm, is seeking intermediate project architects to work in our Soho office. Architectural license preferred, at least five to seven years’ of full-time experience, and experience with commercial, hospitality and mixed use projects a must. Responsibilities include production and coordination of projects from concept design through construction documents."
